abstract: The group, which includes Sprint Nextel and Google, will announce a $12 billion venture to build a new generation of nationwide wireless data networks.
snippet: The group, which includes Sprint Nextel and Google, will announce a $12 billion venture to build a new generation of nationwide wireless data networks.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO  A who’s who of technology and telecommunications companies plans to announce on Wednesday that it intends to build the first of a new generation of nationwide wireless data networks, according to several people briefed on the deal.

headline.main: A Technology Consortium Plans a Wireless Network
headline.print_headline: A Technology Consortium Plans a Wireless Network

abstract: A consortium plans to build the first of a new generation of nationwide wireless data networks in a $14.5 billion deal.
snippet: A consortium plans to build the first of a new generation of nationwide wireless data networks in a $14.5 billion deal.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO  A who’s who of technology and telecommunications companies announced Wednesday that it intended to build the first of a new generation of nationwide wireless data networks.

abstract: In its effort to crack down on people who are very heavy users of file sharing systems, Comcast is considering limiting the bandwidth use of its Internet customers. But the limit it is proposing — 250 gigabytes — is so large it would allow users to watch 11 hours of Internet video each day.
snippet: In its effort to crack down on people who are very heavy users of file sharing systems, Comcast is considering limiting the bandwidth use of its Internet customers. But the limit it is proposing — 250 gigabytes — is so large it would allow users t...
lead_paragraph: Not all limits are unreasonable. If I told my nine-year-old that from now on, she would be allowed no more than 16 cookies a day, I’d get a glassy-eyed “Whatever.”
